title: Olay Definity 14-Day Skin Rehabilitation
description: Olay Definity 14 day skin rehabilitation counteracts past skin stresses to diminish discoloration PLUS wrinkles in just 14 days. Time; stress and the environment - especially the sun - can really take a toll on your skin. Introducing Olay Definity 14 Day Skin Rehabilitation. A total anti-aging skin immersion that detoxifies; recovers; and revives skin's appearance in just 14 days. Total skin immersion hydrates and immediately diminishes the appearance of age spots and wrinkles. Skin will emerge with a more flawless luminosity and diminished look of discoloration in just 14 days.

title: Pantene Pro-V Curly Hair Series Moisture Renewal Shampoo 12.6 Fl Oz (Pack of 6) (packaging may vary)
Neutrogena Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment, Night, 1 Ounce
description: Transform your skin while you sleep and wake up to a firmer, more youthful look with Neutrogena Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment Night (1-ounce). After just a few weeks of use, this formula is clinically proven to soften and smooth skin and decrease the appearance of wrinkles, while also improving skin firmness, resilience, and definition.Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment NightAt a glance:ion2complexserumNight activating moisturizerSmoothes and softens after single useLifts and redefines for a youthful lookRecommended fornightly use2complex before/after">View larger.Breakthrough Ion-Mineral Technology for Healthy, Younger-Looking SkinWith Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment, Neutrogena brings you an advanced, two-step treatment for skin that creates a positive ion flow to improve firmness, resilience, and definition while you sleep--letting you take the next step in reversing the telltale signs of aging.   ion2complex technologyView larger.Healthy skin naturally restores itself with positively charged ion flow, which facilitates cell-to-cell communication. Dermatologists are now recognizing that as we age, this flow diminishes, leading to a breakdown in collagen that causes skin to lose shape and definition.Patented ion2complex contains essential ion-mineral conductors that, when activated by the companion moisturizer, helps to rejuvenate the look of skin so it appears younger and more resilient.Easy, Two-Part Daily Treatment Activates ion2complexSimply apply a small amount of the gray, patented ion2complex gel serum on clean skin, smoothing evenly over face and neck. The unique formula instantly fades to transparent on the skin, signaling that it's time to layer a dime-size amount of the night activating cream to the same areas to activate the ion2complex.View larger.Clinically Proven to Deliver Noticeable ResultsGentle enough to use every day, this treatment immediately gets to work. After only a single use, skin feels softer and smoother. After just four weeks of daily use, this formula enhances skin's natural surface cellular-renewal process and reveals noticeably younger-looking, more toned and resilient skin. It also evens skin tone and minimizes the signs of discoloration; reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles; lifts the look of sagging skin; and improves the look of facial contours and definitions.For best results, use Neutrogena Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment Night in conjunction with Neutrogena Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment Day and Neutrogena Clinical Eye Lift Contouring Treatment.What's in the BoxOne package containing Neutrogena Clinical Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment Night gel serum and moisturizer (1 Ounce).Facial Lifting Wrinkle Treatment - Nightion2complex Serum Ingredients:Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Trisiloxane, Silica, Zinc, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Copper Powder.Night Activating Cream Ingredients:Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sclerotium Gum, DMDM Hydantoin, Propylparaben, Methylparaben, Fragrance.

description: Looking our best requires reflecting the best. Get a brighter and clearer view with this 6" Z Fogless Water Mirror with LED Light Panel & Tri Accessory Holder Stainless Steel from Zadro. These technologically advanced mirrors are fog resistant, making a mirror in the shower an absolute advantage to getting that clean shave because hot water opens pores making shaving smoother and faster. Zadro has been continually providing functional and award winning product designs for over 30 years. Zadro reflects the ever-changing lifestyles and needs of customers with a broad array of Personal Care Mirrors, Bath Accessories, Cosmetic Accessories and Health & Wellness Products!.

description: Invigorating shampoo infused with 100% natural rosemary and mint. It gently cleanses and increases manageability for hair that’s soft and shiny.
